name: i❤️metal
description:
/!\ SOUND WARNING /!\ > you might want to lower your volume (you know, if you're a p*ssy)

Alternate between left and right arrows to headbang!

Drink beer (click on it) to get energy, but don't drink too much man!

The game stops when you're too tired or you know, when you pass out.

Created in 1.5h (ok almost 2h) for hitboxmakers' secret santa gamejam.
